about_the_game:
In Boxing School: Solo Career Mode you become a boxer in the 80s. You train, you fight and climb the ranks. Play your own career story from beginner to star. This new expansion puts you into the shoes of a rookie boxer trying to survive. You'll be juggling your training, work, recreational time, and possible stardom. With great struggle comes great rewards.

Be a part of the rivalry

This expansion offers new gameplay with more detailed and in-depth rivalry system. All top contenders now have unique personality types that always seek to win out over their greatest threats, sparking drama and rivalry in the top around the champion belt.

Choose your manager

Now you are the boxer and you will choose your own manager along the way. All managers have different sets of skills, talents and ambitions. Remember that a manager will have great impact on your career. Choose wisely.

Spend your money wisely

How will you spend your earnings outside the ring? Can you afford to upgrade your house or your gym equipment? Maybe take a vacation to relax between fights? Or maybe you can buy that new sports car that you always have been dreaming about if you win the next big fight.

Go the distance

Manage your own way to fight between rounds to gain the edge on your rivals in the ring. Do you want to go for early KO and risk to run out of gas or play it more safe and wait for the right moment to strike when your opponent is tired. The choice is yours.

Key Features:

  • Create your own boxer and play a new expanded career story mode.
  • Hire a manager or a promoter to arrange fights and sign deals.
  • Buy, upgrade and manage your own house and gym equipment.
  • Choose your strategy in fights, adjust your tactics between rounds.
  • Become famous and gain worldwide fans or even fanclubs.
  • Earn the right to challenge the champion himself for the title belt.
